messages.title: Special Report: Conservative MP's Broken Promises
messages.content: Labour are out of the race here and have already lost nationally. Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Positive plans to give our NHS the funding it needs.
Standing up more Conservative cuts to school budgets and teachers.

community.content: Help get real change for Eastleigh

contactInformation.address: Eastleigh Liberal Democrats, 107 Leigh Road, Eastleigh, SO50 9DR

endorsements.endorsement: Liberal Democrats celebrate stunning council wins in both North and South.

quotes.text: Labour are fatally divided inside parliament and outside it.
Conservative poll showed party would 'lose seats' to the Liberal Democrats.
Tory cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse says shocking report.

images.caption: A fresh start for Eastleigh: Mike and the Liberal Democrats are the only ones who can beat the Conservatives in Eastleigh
Eastleigh residents remember with anger the General Election two years ago when Conservative Eastleigh MP Mims Davies promised new road investment and jobs for local people.
